title: Changing status message via an automated software
body:
Hello Riot,

I hope that there might be a way to update my status message via automated software (by sending a command to the client via cmd, or changing a file, for example.) This way I could update my message automatically, so that my friends won't spam my chat looking for me when I'm playing other games, for example. Is there a way to do that? Thanks.

Best regards

replies.body: Hmmmm I don't think there's going to be a way to have it automated. Your best bet is to setup your status before queueing up, or possibly just changing your online status to busy.
